1: NASA's garbage images. First, you'll notice they call it an "image gallery" instead of a "photo gallery." Take any image of earth of north america. You'll notice that the area covered by north america is nearly half of the image. Well, let's look at some numbers and do some basic arithmetic to prove these images are garbage CGI:
Looking at any sphere, you see nearly half of the sphere. A sphere with a radius of 3,963 miles - NASA's claim of the earth's radius - has a surface area of just about 197 million square miles. Half of that is 96.5 million square miles. Let's call it 95. North america has a surface area of 9.5 million square miles. This means that a picture of north america should show only 10% of coverage for north america.
Adding up the land masses of the other continents gives roughly 40 million square miles. And remember, 2/3rds of earth's surface is water so you have to add 80 million square miles of water for a total of 120 million square miles to fit on the back side of that same sphere where only north america occupies one whole side. This means you have cram 120 million square miles of land and water onto the back side of that same sphere. Last I checked, 120 was quite a bit larger than 95.
Here's a graphical illustration of this blatant deception:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1addwk1HEz7dYmrd5ZPLCxYyKZ0sL4jYC/view?usp=sharing

2: Spheres produce very narrow shadows on other spheres. You can see this yourself: in a dark room, take a big ball, a small ball, and a bright flashlight. You'll see the shadow created is very narrow. Oh, also bring a sheet of construction paper and look at the curved shadow created by its flat edge. And, no, the darkening of the moon is not caused by the earth's shadow. It's caused by the electrical interference of the nearness of the sun.

3: There are many, many photos of objects far beyond "the horizon" taken with high zoom cameras and even further ones take with infrared filters. The Chicago skyline was not a mirage. A mirage is both blurry and inverted. Again, go back to your big hotel and the long hallway. Lay on the ground and have a friend walk down the hall. You will see their legs "vanish" first. Again, this is the perspective of the vanish point.

4: Circumnavigation: First, this has never happened North/South. Now, if you take a dinner plate and place a magnet at the center, then moving a compass around the plates edge will cause the compass to align to the center of the plate. Same problem as with your 90° hike. Look into Admiral Byrd and his attempt to find the edges of antartica. Why did it take 3 years to travel such a claimed short distance?

5: Stars. If you stand in a large room with the number 9 painted on the ceiling and move to the bottom of the 9 and look back, then you will see a 6 while a person above the 9 will still see a 9 simultaneously. There are even memes of this happening in real time. This is the weakest globe argument ever. Further, according to your globe model, the night sky should change completely every single night since the stars are supposedly traveling millions of miles in all different directions. Instead, they repeat themselves every day and every year since man began tracking stars. Not a single star has shifted, increased/decreased brightness, or moved out of alignment from its constellation.

6: The sun lowers due to perspective. Even airplanes seem to drop in altitude as they fly away. All distant objects converge in the vanishing line. Any 1st year artist learns this. Look at a long hallway in a big hotel: the floor will rise to meet the lowering ceiling. The problem with your sticks and shadows is that you assume the sun is 93 million miles away. Garbage in, garbage out. You can perform this same math on a kitchen table and "prove" that your table is curved. This is not science, this is dogma.

7: The problem with the 90° hike is that your orientation is taken from north meaning your 90° shifts as you move either west or east. Instead, create a long structure with measured 90° angles and you'll find they do not connect. However, look at railroad lines. They are created along direct paths and never account for any form of curve; neither do tunnels, bridges, or any other form of architecture. Not a single architecture formula accounts for any curve whatsoever.

8: Coriolis has never been proved. I'm glad you specified cannon balls because experiments with cannon balls prove there is no spin: balls fired in any direction, with the same force and angle, will hit the same distance away. Firing a cannon ball straight up will allow the ball to fall directly back into the cannon. Rail guns prove we're not spinning as no correction for "spin" is ever considered. Mortar teams never account for "spin" and aim directly at their target regardless of their cardinal direction. Finally, hurricanes will spin the opposite direction in the same region; this was commonly known but has been made more difficult to find as censorship of truth has increased. Whirlpools are commonly found spinning in different directions in the same body of water and very close to each other. Further, there is no mention of coriolis in sniper manuals. If you think there is, then show where it's calculated. Instead, what snipers calculate for is called the "magnus effect" which is caused by the rotation of the bullet and not the earth. This is why this calculation is always the same direction relative to the barrel and has nothing to do with cardinal direction orientation.

9: Timezones? Really? These work on both. The extra flaw in your model is the assumption that day and night are always half as you would see on a sphere. Instead, sun light wraps around as you see in a snow globe with a flat base. See Gleason's map for an illustration. We can't see sun light from everywhere on earth at the same time for a few reasons: perspective; water in the air; and the angular resolution limits of our eyes. Even fog is sufficient block vision down to only a few feet.

Errors in your logic are as follows and I'll address them one at a time to help reduce clutter when you NASA fan boys start to lose your minds:

What is the coolest thing you’ve ever done as part of your job at Goddard?


The last time anyone took a photograph from above low Earth orbit that showed an entire hemisphere (one side of a globe) was in 1972 during Apollo 17. NASA’s Earth Observing System (EOS) satellites were designed to give a check-up of Earth’s health. By 2002, we finally had enough data to make a snap shot of the entire Earth. So we did. The hard part was creating a flat map of the Earth’s surface with four months’ of satellite data. Reto Stockli, now at the Swiss Federal Office of Meteorology and Climatology, did much of this work. Then we wrapped the flat map around a ball. My part was integrating the surface, clouds, and oceans to match people’s expectations of how Earth looks from space. That ball became the famous Blue Marble.

I was happy with it but had no idea how widespread it would become. We never thought it would become an icon. I certainly never thought that I would become “Mr. Blue Marble.”

We have since updated the base maps by increasing the resolution and, for 2004, we made a series of monthly maps.

earth is a globe, aircraft need to pitch down in order to maintain a constant altitude. So, for example, if an airplane makes a flight which covers a 15 degree arc across the earth's surface (which is a distance of about a thousand miles), then the airplane will need to pitch down by 15 degrees over the course of the flight.
However, in order to accomplish this, pilots don't "drop the nose of the plane every couple of minutes". Instead, they watch the altimeter, and raise or lower the nose as needed to maintain a constant altitude, or to climb or descend as necessary. (Or they set the autopilot to do the same thing.) This means that they're adjusting the plane's pitch every couple of seconds, and the adjustments that they use to maintain altitude are much, much larger than the adjustments that would be needed to merely match the curvature of the earth.

AMERICAN ASTRONAUT James Irwin's God-honoring CHRISTIAN testimony FROM THE MOON. Apollo 15 had to orbit the round global earth before heading to the moon.

JAMES IRWIN'S TESTIMONY

Jim [James Irwin] felt God’s love and presence in a powerful way out there. Though separated from home by 215,000 miles, he sensed a nearness and presence of God that he never anticipated. Some other Apollo astronauts also had spiritual experiences during their missions, but Irwin knew the God of the Bible personally. In the midst of their hectic schedule, he had time to briefly quote his favorite Bible verse, Psalm 121:1, I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help. It was particularly fitting against the massive hills of the Apennine Mountains and canyons of Hadley Rille, but we must hasten to verse 2, which gives the answer to the question: My help cometh from the Lord, who made heaven and earth. Graciously deferring to the hard-working ground crew back on Earth, Jim appended, “but of course we get quite a bit from Houston, too.” Several times when problems arose deploying experiments, he prayed for help. Almost immediately, ideas would come to mind that worked. He describes some of these moments:
It was almost like a revelation. God was telling me what to do. I never asked Houston because I knew there would be a delay. I didn’t have time for Houston to get an answer to me; I needed an immediate answer. I could see several logical ways to go about solving these mechanical problems, but I wanted to know the best way. I prayed, and immediately I knew the answer. I am not talking about some vague sense of direction. There was this supernatural sensation of His presence. If I needed Him I could call on Him, call on His power. (To Rule the Night,p. 19)
He describes the sensation of looking up at home:
In the three days of exploration, there were a couple of times when I actually looked up to see the earth—and it was a difficult maneuver in that bulky suit; you had to grab onto something to hold yourself steady and then lean back as far as you could. That beautiful, warm living object looked so fragile, so delicate, that if you touched it with a finger it would crumble and fall apart. Seeing this has to change a man, has to make a man appreciate the creation of God and the love of God. (Ibid., p. 60.).

"Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ (Romans 5:1)."

TOP TEN REASONS WHY "THE TOP TEN REASONS WE 'BELEIVE' THE EARTH IS ROUND" ARE MERELY ARBITRARY AND FLAWED:
10. "Other" planets = the ASSUMPTION that we live on a planet, 
9. Time Zones can and do exist on a flat plane with a small and local sun,
8. Somehow airplanes are exempt from the so-called Coriolis effect? 
7. This is theoretical assuming a globe. No one has actually walked 10,000km straight.
6. Perspective and angular resolution with a small and local sun explains the setting sun and shadows perfectly, 
5. Stars on a local firmament appear exactly as described, 
4. Circular circumnavigation exists in BOTH models, 
3. Again, perspective and vanishing point explains this perfectly, 
2. A flat object would cast a curved shadow on a curved surface, a curved object would cast a greatly exaggerated curved shadow on a curved surface, HOWEVER, there is NO proof that either the moon or the earth is curved OR that the "shadow" we see is indeed a shadow cast by ANY object, 
1. CGI is NOT photographic evidence.

In summary, there exists evidence that things either work on both globe and flat models, or only work on a flat model. There is NOTHING that only works on a ball.
We live on a flat, motionless, enclosed plane . . . exactly as we see and feel.

#10. All other planets are round, therefore the Earth should be round.

That is not a true argument. You cannot look to the sky to determine the shape of the Earth beneath your feet. Nobody would determine the dimensions of the floor of a house by looking up at the light fixtures.

#9. Timezones. It's always day somewhere and always night somewhere.

Yes the sun's observable movement across the sky determines when it is day and when it is night. Again this is not a true argument and does not prove the dimensions of the Earth beneath your feet.

#8. Coriolis Effect.

The Coriolis effect is said to cause sinks and toilet bowl water to spin in different directions based on your position on Earth due to Earth's alleged movement. However this has been proven false due to the fact the sinks and toilet bowls have been found to spin in opposite directions within the same house. The motion of the water is dependent on the entry of the water, shape of the bowl or basin etc..The Coriolis effect does not exist.

#7. Triangles.

This CAN be achieved on a flat surface.

#6. Shadows

Shadow's do not prove the Earth has curvature. It must be first assumed that the Earth is a Globe to begin with. If you however use a local sun on a Flat Earth the shadow's would still remain the same. I.E it literally proves nothing.

#5. Stars

The stars appear different on "different" parts of the Earth. Yes you are viewing them from different positions on Earth. It doesn't prove the Earth is a Globe.

#4. Circumnavigation.

This can be done on a Flat Surface. East to West in reality is merely a circle. However North to South and back to North has never been achieved. This would be proof the Earth is a Globe, something that is lacking.

#3. Horizons

The horizon changes based on the strength of your instruments and your height above the Earth. The human eye see's everything in pyramid shape. So when standing at the end of a long hall way everything appears to shrink in the distance, the floor appears to rise, the ceiling appears to come down and meet at a point. The same is true with the horizon. It is simply perspective and the way the human eye works, you can never see the whole Earth because our eye sight is not infinite.

#2. Lunar Eclipse

Lunar eclipses have occurred while both sun and moon are visible above the horizon. Therefore the object eclipsing the moon is not the Earth. The has been recorded numerous times and all we get is an explanation for why this occurs. However the explanation is simply that, it's an explanation attempting to explain away common sense perspective and maintain the status quo. I.E Earth is still a ball with 0 proof. Merely explanations and interpretations of phenomena.

#1. Photographic Evidence.

It is photo-shop, but it has to be. Admitted by NASA themselves. Composite images stitched together to form a picture. A picture doesn't prove the ground beneath our feet is curved. Nice work overall, but you really need a better idea of who you’re dealing with if you’re gonna go ahead and make a video like this. 6/10 arguments you provide are easily “discredited” by flat-earthers. This seems to be a consistent problem with videos like this, since they really don’t seem to understand the belief system of their intended audience. I would love to see more content providers aware of this so they could do a better job of shutting flat-earthers up.

Anything involving celestial bodies is immediately thrown out the window since the disk-shaped earth is apparently covered by a holographic dome projecting images of what fits the globular earth narrative. So arguments #10, 9, 6, 5, and 2 can be immediately thrown out. When trying to convince these people, you simply cannot depend on what can be seen in the sky, even with their own eyes.

Argument #1, lol don’t you know NASA is trying to deceive you into thinking the Earth is round for some still unclear and poorly articulated reason? You can’t trust anything they say. All of the photographs they make publically available are obviously Photoshopped.

Arguments #7 and 4 would be extremely difficult to replicate. First, you can’t expect people who think the Earth is flat to be able to afford trips like this in general. Very few people, even fairly wealthy individuals trying to prove a globular Earth, have the free time or motivation to undertake these travels over vast distances themselves. How many people do you know can just travel around the world in one direction over the weekend to prove it’s round, or are willing to drive 10,000km in one direction, then 10,000km in another direction, and 10,000km in another direction to prove the triangle principle you mentioned? Not very many, I’d bet. With these flat-earth people, you have to introduce concepts that are easy for them to replicate themselves without substantial critical thinking skills and without too much time or money being invested.

So now we get to the decent arguments you mentioned, because they can be personally repeated by these people in question. You can add two more things to the mix: GPS and old-style navigation. GPS assumes a round earth and it works. (Well, as for those times it doesn't work, it's the fault of your unit (which probably contains bad code or bad map data), not the GPS satellites.) In the early days of transatlantic voyages, one needed to keep track of one's latitude and longitude. The former is easy: just measure the altitude of the north star. The latter, longitude, ain't so easy. The stars move from east to west across the sky as time goes on. They also move if you travel east or west a significant distance. Now, when you're in the middle of the Atlantic (or any other ocean), you can compare the current stars' positions with what they were when you left shore. And they will have moved both due to the earth's rotation and to your travels. But what you see is the sum of the two. How to disentangle them? Use a chronometer. That will tell you how much the stars move due to the passage of time (amount of earth's rotation). Subtract that from your observations and you end up with how much the stars have moved solely due to your travels! This was why there was a competition for people to come up with increasingly accurate chronometers. ALL THIS ONLY WORKS IF THE EARTH IS ROUND, WHICH IT IS, WHICH IS WHY IT WORKS. Okay.

All they need to do, in order to prove to themselves that their theory is wrong, is to travel around the globe in either an Easterly or Westerly direction,  by boat, on foot or by air, whilst adjusting their wristwatch to local time as they arrive at successive countries, until they return to their starting point, whereupon they will find that the date on their wristwatch will be one day ahead or behind the calendar at their origin. The only logical explanation for this apparent phenomenon is that they have travelled all the way around a rotating sphere. They could double check that by setting off in any direction and follow a straight line for 10,000 kilometres, then turn 90° left or right, then travel along that path for exactly 10,000 kilometres, and next make another 90° turn in the same left or right direction as before, then finally travel for another 10,000 kilometres in a straight lin. At the end of that 30,000 kilometre journey they will be back at their starting point. The only sane explanation for this is that they will have travelled around the surface of a 40,000 kilometre sphere. No shape other than a sphere would yield that result. Try it with a ball; draw three consecutive straight lines, each  ¼ of the diameter of the ball in length, and all at right angles to each other, turning to the right each time, and you will be back at the starting point on that ball. Now try to do the same thing with any other geometric shape, and also on a flat sheet of paper (like a flat earth), and the finish point will not be the starting point. 4. Circumnavigation - point out that east-west circumnavigation is possible on the flat earth; assert that no north-south circumnavigation has ever happened. LMAO. 10 ridiculous reasons debunked...... the earth is not a globe!

10. All of the stars and planets we have ever seen are round- there's no reason to indicate that the earth should be any different.


Great observation! They DO appear to be round. Round=Circular. The sun and moon are round, circular disks. The stars and planets appear to be round circular lights. Thus, the earth must be round shaped as well. And, it is. The flat earth map depicts an accurate, ROUND, circular disk of earth, with Antarctica surrounding everything. It's like a plate, and a plate is ROUND. How in hell is this observation used as proof that earth is a sphere? It should be used to prove that the earth is circular, but of course that would be crazy talk!
Raising eyebrows


9. Times zones: Day and night happen at different times, at different places on earth. It's always day somewhere,and night somewhere else. 


No shit day and night happen at different times and places on earth. The sun and moon make their rounds like clockwork over earth, the land passing below sun being daytime and the land passing below moon being nighttime. BUT, sometimes, the sun and moon will be visible in the same sky. In the north pole, the sun doesn't set in the winter, and the sun doesn't rise at all in the Summer. It doesn't make sense on the spinning globe theory, but perfect sense on the flat earth theory. Think I'm full of shit? Look up "sun doesn't set flat earth" and "flat earth sun and moon seasons and cycles", for starters


8. Coriolis effect states that freely moving things (hurricanes, cannon balls, ect) will deflect to the right because of rotation of Earth.. North of equator deflects right ,south of equator deflects left. 


Its weather phenomena and has to do with the magnetism of the sun, moon and tides. The key to the Coriolis effect lies in the Earth's rotation. Considering there's irrefutable evidence that proves Earth as being flat and motionless, it's easy to dismiss the so called "effect" No rotation, no Coriolis affect. No rotation, no gravity.

7. Triangle test-walking, turning, walking and turning to create a perfect right triangle... is impossible on a flat surface. 

Wrong. I can draw the triangle image on a flat piece of paper, and any person can duplicate the triangle on a flat surface. Ridiculous statement, come on now. 

6. Sun sets lower in sky as you drive away from equator. Measure curvature using sticks and shadows at different locations. 


The sun sets lower and lower in sky because your following it's path in the sky. Its always gonna appear to be setting. And the shadow test doesn't measure curvature. It measures the distance the sun has travelled after passing directly overhead of observer. The further the sun is, the more angled the shadow will be. This is actually a flat earth proof. Look up "flat earth time zones and shadow experiment".

5. constellation upside down on various places on earth. 


The stars and planets circle us. Like a babies lullaby toy dangling above it face in a crib. It rotates. For an observer on one side of earth, Orion's belt will be upright. As the stars continue to move in a clock wise circle above earth, what was upright to the first observer would appear upside down to the observer on the other farther side of the earth. Simple really.


4.Circumnavigation proves a globe.


Actually, one can easily circumnavigate the world on a flat earth. Look at a flat each map, and trace your finger in a circle around the lumps of land, keeping your finger in the shaded blue of ocean. Possible! Circumnavigation DOES NOT prove the earth is a globe. 


3.Ships disappear over the horizon, thus proving a curve.


It's called the law of perspective. The farther an objects gets from the observer, the smaller the object becomes before disappearing from sight. You can watch a ship disappear over the horizon, yes. But if you grabbed binoculars and looked, you would see it come back into focus. Let it disappear over the curve again, and grab a telescope. It's comes back into sight! The curve is an illusion to the naked eye. The horizon is the vanishing point. 


2. lunar eclipse-the black shadow is round and must be the earth.


This is a phenomoma that isn't fully understood yet. It's NOT the moon eclipsing the sun, for there have been numerous documented occasions in which the moon was seen in the sky during an eclipse. And models attempting to show how the eclipse happens either show the earth spinning in wrong direction, or the Moon orbiting the earth at break neck speeds. Look it up.

[5] “The stars at night change as you go north or south. For example Orion is upside‒down if you’re in Australia.“

So, from across Lake Michigan you’d be able to see all of Chicago, as well as the Rocky Mountains.”
Only [C] is reached, thereafter disaffirmed and refuted by means of mere magnification, whereby objects repeatedly reappear when they could not were Earth round. In addition the video’s author err by stating as fact that were Earth flat the Rocky Mountains may be seen. [2] “During a lunar eclipse, the shadow of the Earth on the moon is curved.”

Summary of [10~1]: As a group it is possible they could reach [C], but still have a long way to go to reach [L]. I DEBUNK ALL TEN, part 1/2

To preface, the video’s author(s) clearly intend to disprove Earth as being flat, a wholly unnecessary task were they to adequately prove ‘ ... the Earth is Round.’ I am neither a flat‒Earther nor a ball‒Earther. Evidence that Earth is flat is inadequate, and sphericity has been disproven in numerous ways. I do not claim to know of Earth’s shape, but am in the midst of developing a hypothesis. If in need of credentials I am a trained and professional scientist, physics‒based engineer, and geographer.

Most or all of the 10 are likely disprovable by means more fundamental than science, such as Aristotle’s Organon or the trivium. The video is ripe with simple logical errors, called fallacies. However, I will use only the scientific method to debunk. But because I witness that the vast majority of people (including the video’s authors) do not adequately grasp the meaning of science, nor that it is our best tool to understand our natural world, it is necessary that I first provide some DEFINITIONS and a brief summary of the sequence known as the scientific method. They will be referred to throughout the short exercise.

A–PRIORI: an unEMPIRICAL DEDUCTION
A–POSTERIORI: an EMPIRICAL INDUCTION
ALGORITHM: a sequence of instructions utilizing FORMULAe or EQUATIONS
CALCULATION: the answer to a FORMULA or EQUATION
DEDUCTION: a result generated via cogent or LOGICal reasoning of self‒evident premises, which is:
* unEMPIRICAL,
* not backed by data,
* utilizes information that is insufficient,
* cannot be negated by data,
* may or may not be provable,
* requires a leap in imagination, or
* relies upon ALGORITHM, approximation, argument, assertion, assumption, CALUCATION, conjecture, EQUATION, estimation, explanation, FORMULA, guess, interpretation, judgment, mathematics, prediction, presumption, reasoning, speculation, or supposition.
EMPIRICAL: verifiable via events, experiments (developed or performed as necessary), FACTs, observations, or practical experiences
EQUATION: a FORMULA of equivalence
FACT: a verified observation (e.g. 2 +2 =4)
FORMULA: an expression of mathematics
HYPO‒THESIS: a position or proposition that is:
* explicitly based on all known and available data,
* maintained through DEDUCTION,
* advanced without proof, but substantiated, and
* has a specific way to be tested and disproven or verified; EMPIRICAL
INDUCTION: a generalized conclusion or inference brought about by adducing particular instances, and validated via demonstrations, either experimental or mathematical
LAW: An irrevocable rule of nature; often inappropriately interchanged with THEORY or principle
LOGIC: compelling, correct, or convincing
PARADIGM: a typical pattern of something; a model
THEORY: a THESIS that has been so vigorously‒tested and EMPIRICALly‒verified to have demonstrated the inability to be disproven
THESIS: a HYPO‒THESIS advanced to INDUCTION by means of EMPIRICAL verification; A‒POSTERIORI

Science requires sequencing as follows:
[A] Recognize a PARADIGM.
[B] Gather an adequate degree or number of substantiated suppositions (including ALGORITHMs, approximations, arguments, assertions, assumptions, CALCULATIONs, EQUATIONs, estimations, FORMULAe, guesses, interpretations, judgments, mathematics, predictions, presumptions, reasoning) with which to speculate a conjecture.
[C] Employ LOGIC or reason to generate and form an explanation for the conjecture, an A‒PRIORI DEDUCTION.
[D] Verify all substantiated suppositions do not negate or refute the DEDUCTION. A single occurrence of disaffirmation refutes the DEDUCTION and the sequence reverts to [A~C] for modification. Note that evidence counts as verified suppositions.
[E] Gather all available data and information, such as events, FACTs, and observations.
[F] Ensure explicitness of all available data and information.
[G] Complete [A~F] for a substantially large group of verified DEDUCTIONS, and an equally large group of collections of explicit data and information.
[H] Employ LOGIC and reason to develop and propose a HYPO‒THESIS that binds the entire group of verified DEDUCTIONS.
[I] Verify EMPIRICALLY every aspect of the HYPO‒THESIS. A single occurrence of disaffirmation disproves the HYPO‒THESIS, and the sequence reverts to [A~H] for modification. Note that evidence counts as verified data, events, experiments, FACTs, information, observations, and practical experiences.
[J] INDUCE the advancement to an A‒POSTERIORI THESIS by means of thoroughly examining events, FACTs, observations, practical experiences, and results of experiments.
[K] Ensure that vigorous and comprehensive efforts are made by others across Earth, and over an adequately‒lengthy timeline, to verify EMPIRICALLY every aspect of the THESIS. A single occurrence of disaffirmation disproves the THESIS and the sequence reverts to [A~J] for modification.
[L] Upon ultimate failure to disprove the THESIS it may be advanced to status of THEORY or principle.

Our limit is reached at [L]. One rightful tennet of science is that while anything may be disproven, nothing may be proven absolutely. Status as THEORY or principle is the best we can do, and even these may be disproven at any time, by anyone who demonstrates a single occurrence of disaffirmation. Every last person in Earth is invited to the show known as science. Scientists just attend to make a living.

Debunking ‘reasons why we know the Earth is round’:

[10] “All the other planets and stars we’ve ever seen are round, and there’s no reason to indicate the Earth should be any different.”
Only [A] is reached ... a long way to go to reach [L].

[9] “Time Zones: Day and night happen at different times at different places on Earth. In fact, it’s always day somewhere, and night somewhere else.”
Only [A] is reached, recognition of a PARADIGM.

[8] “The Coriolis Effect means freely moving things, like cannonballs or hurricane winds, are deflected to the right, but only if you’re north of the equator. If you’re south of the equator they’re deflected left.”
Only [A] is reached.

[7] “Triangles: If you walk 10,000km straight along the Earth’s surface, turn 90 degree right, walk 10,000km more, turn right again and walk another 10,000km, you’ll be back to where you started, having successfully make a triangle with three 90 degree angles. As any geometry student can tell you, this is impossible on a flat surface.”
Authors omit this triangle is possible only when each leg traverses exactly 1/4 of a circumference. Author omit that such an experiment has never been done. Authors omit that nowhere on Earth is it possible to walk this route. Authors omit that such an experiment may not be verifiable. Authors omit that such triangles are also achievable on a sphere’s interior, as well as upon the exterior and interior of other non‒spherical shapes, such as pyramidal‒ovoids. I could go on, but suffice to say that not even [A] is reached.

[6] “The sun, in general, gets lower and lower in the sky as you travel away from the equator. And, you can use this to directly measure the Earth’s curvature. Pick 2 places a few hundred miles directly north and south of each other, and at noon measure the shadows cast by a meter stick at each location. You can use the shadow lengths to figure out the angle between the sticks. And, once you find out how far apart they are, you can calculate the Earth’s curvature.”
Only [A] is reached, after which the presumption is made that such phenomena must be due to Earth having spherical curvature. At [B] any number and degree of substantiated suppositions could be derived and gathered, from which conjectures of many shapes other than a sphere could be reasonably speculated upon. For instance such shadows are just as mathematically‒conceivable upon a flat‒Earth as they are upon a spherical Earth.

Actually, Earth is an American musical group based in Olympia, Washington, formed in 1989 and led by the guitarist Dylan Carlson. Earth's music is nearly all instrumental, and can be divided into two distinct stages. Their early work is characterized by distortion, droning, minimalism, and lengthy, repetitive song structures. The band's later output reduces the distortion while incorporating elements of country, jazz rock, and folk. Earth is recognized as a pioneer of drone metal, with the band's Earth 2 being regarded as a milestone of the genre.

I have to be honest. I was very unsure for a good 5 days or so. I was seriously considering that the earth is not spherical. I tried to openly discuss this with friends because I wanted to share the enquiry with them in terms of skeptical debate. It was surprising to find that no one even wanted to consider reaching a more concrete based belief about it. Anyway I was left to research on my own and consider deeply how that I can truly know that the earth is a globe. I learnt a lot from the challenging of beliefs that we generally hold in unshakeable faith. I also learnt that moonlight may be producing a cooling light.. which totally blew my mind. I've encountered theories that state that the drop in temperature in areas of direct moonlight could be due to loss of heat into space. I am yet to see this verified. Also the last point you make about the pictures of earth are one of the main reasons some people are very dubious as there is no doubt that NASA is editing and possibly completely fabricating these images. Anyway thanks for the vid. It was seeing the moon and stars the other way around and the  vortex spinning alternate ways on both hemispheres that led me to returning to my belief that the earth is spherical. When the moon is full, the sun is high enough below or above the earth to cast light onto the entire visible surface of the moon. "all other planets are round, and there is no reason to think earth would be any different" ummmm let's try life and water for one.

(b) "Airey's failure" (Reference - Proc. Roy. Soc. London v 20 p 35). Telescopes have to be very slightly tilted to get the starlight going down the axis of the tube because of the earth's "speed around the sun". Airey filled a telescope with water that greatly slowed down the speed of the light inside the telescope and found that he did not have to change the angle of the telescope. This showed that the starlight was already coming in at the correct angle so that no change was needed. This demonstrated that it was the stars moving relative to a stationary earth and not the fast orbiting earth moving relative to the comparatively stationary stars. If it was the telescope moving he would have had to change the angle.

(c) The Sagnac experiment (Reference - Comptes Rendus 1913 v157 p 708-710 and 1410-3) Sagnac rotated a table complete with light and mirrors with the light being passed in opposite directions around the table between the mirrors. He detected the movement of the table by the movement of the interference fringes on the target where they were recombined. This proved that there IS an aether that the light has to pass through and this completely destroys Einstein's theory of Relativity that says there is no aether. It is for this reason that this experiment is completely ignored by scientists. More recently Kantor has found the same result with similar apparatus.
(Il Nuovo Cimento 32B(1):1-27, 11 March 1977) proved that a hollow sphere (the universe) rotating around a solid sphere inside (the earth) produced exactly the same results of Coriolis forces, dragging of Foucault pendulums etc. that are put forward as "proofs" of heliocentricity! This paper gives several other confirmations of the superiority of the geocentric model.

Thus, there is evidence that the earth is NOT moving around the sun, but either the aether is moving around the earth carrying the planets with it, or the earth is spinning on its axis. The most likely model is that the aether is rotating around the earth as calculations show that if it did not, it would rapidly collapse upon itself

Other generalizationsEdit

A relay of pulses that circumnavigates the Earth, verifying precise synchronization, is also recognized as a case requiring correction for the Sagnac effect. In 1984 a verification was set up that involved three ground stations and several GPS satellites, with relays of signals both going eastward and westward around the world.[20] In the case of a Sagnac interferometer a measure of difference in arrival time is obtained by producing interference fringes, and observing the fringe shift. In the case of a relay of pulses around the world the difference in arrival time is obtained directly from the actual arrival time of the pulses. In both cases the mechanism of the difference in arrival time is the same: the Sagnac effect.

Really it's impossible to prove that the earth isn't flat. A member of the flat earth society made a response to this video that makes arguments against each of these ideas, and they're all scientifically sound. People who actually believe the earth is flat have done their research and put forward theories that are just as legitimate as ones put forth by this video and by round earth theorists. The most important thing when talking about flat earth theory is understanding how much we really don't know about our existence. You can't disprove flat earth theory to an individual (short of taking them into space and showing them) anymore than you can prove the existence of god to an individual (short of showing them god). It is all conjecture. Flat earth theory is actually very interesting, and any "proof" that you have that the earth is round has a counter "proof" that the earth is flat. Do some research on your own and don't rely on a three minute video to define your view of the universe.

As the sun moves across the sky over the course of a day, from horizon to horizon, it stays exactly the same size. This indicates that the sun is a very long way away. If the sun is a very long way away and the Earth is flat then shadows all over the Earth would be the same size and at the same angle. This is not the case, the sizes and angles of shadows change gradually over the surface of the Earth at any given moment. It would also be daytime at the same time everywhere if the Earth was flat. There is only one sensible conclusion: the Earth is round.

Reason 11: Satellites.
Satellites have all been launched to orbit around the Earth. If the Earth was flat, then it would be impossible. If the Earth was flat, how would you call people? Where would you get your TV, the ISS?
...then, HOW WOULD YOU BE ABLE TO WATCH THIS VIDEO IN THE FIRST PLACE?!

Reason 12: Map Projections. Map projections are basically like flat Earths. Except it's not perfect. There are several map projections, but not all of them are perfect because the Earth isn't flat. If the Earth was INDEED flat, then there would be a perfect map projection of the Earth. If you believe the Earth is flat, then draw a perfect map, I DARE you.

Reason 13: Stuff in the sky. Surely if you believe the Earth is flat then everything else in the sky is flat as well, isn't that right? Wrong. Whenever there is a solar eclipse, you don't see a rectangle on the Earth. And even if you believe that only the Earth is flat, in our only possibly imperfect projections online, you don't see a circular shadow on the Earth, which is basically just a reinforcement of Reason 12.

Reason 14: We have Live Footage. Think pictures aren't enough? Then we have live videos right from the ISS (slight reinforcement of Reason 11). You could clearly see the Earth is round if you watched any time NASA would give out live footage of the ISS orbiting the round Earth. The Earth is even rotating! And it was obvious that after a 1 hour and 32 minute orbit (yes, NASA did have live footage of the ISS orbit) they were back to where they were.
Live Footage is quite hard to fake, because there is no time for any person like Photoshop guys from NASA (there aren't even any) to modify it before it is broadcast. Even then, staging something like that on Earth would be impossible; they even had zero gravity!

http://www.esa.int/Our_Activities/Human_Spaceflight/International_Space_Station/Where_is_the_International_Space_Station

Reason 15: Occam's razor. People who believe in flat Earths make WAY more assumptions than those who don't. They believe the curving when you travel in a straight line on the Earth is a "figment of your imagination". This is obviously just one assumption. Then they have to assume what lies at the end of the flat Earth.
It could be "a drop into the nothingness" (which count as 2 assumptions), "an invisible barrier God created" or "where a giant space octopus hides", and some random nonsense like that. For us who believe the Earth is round, we only have to assume that the Earth repeats at the "edge".

The earth is definitely round but it is also hollow and not a ball of solid rock with a molten iron core as we all were brainwashed into believing since our birth by the government controlled scientific communities like NASA. Do the research for yourself.

Let us imagine that we find ourselves in a position where we have no evidence or knowledge about the geometrical properties of the earth. For example, on one cloudy night you find yourself awakened in a hospital with selective amnesia, you are aware of basic laws of nature, etc, but are oblivious to the shape of the earth or the heliocentric model. This being the middle of a cloudy night you have no ability to look out of the window to see the horizon or infer anything from the lack of stars above. At that point you have zero evidence to believe that the earth is any particular shape as, for all you know, it could be an octagon, a helix, or even go on indefinitely. So, if you have no evidence to support any given proposition it is only logical to suspend belief of all. This is what is known the default position or non-belief.
Now, Say that 4 people come to you and each put forth their proposition of  the shape of the world. Person 1 claims that the earth is on an infinite 2D plane and goes on forever in all directions. Person 2 claims that the earth is a hollow sphere containing the sun and we are in the interior. Person 3 claims that the earth is a flat disk. Person 4 claims that earth is a sphere orbiting the sun.
How do you know which one of those is true? You begin by assigning the burden of proof, each person must themselves present evidence to support their proposition. Person 1 attempts to justify his infinite space theory by claiming that he personally walked for a really long time and didn't find an end, therefore there isn't one, thus engaging in an argument from ignorance so you dismiss his point. Person 2 presents speculative analysis from a handful of less-than-credible individuals who support the theory with pseudo-scientific and overly complicated 'evidence' of blue gas and optical illusions caused by the inner atmosphere. Person 3 presents archaic arguments which border on ideology as well as 'evidence' such as the lack of curvature in lakes. Some of this evidence seems compelling and is the best explanation of the world you've heard so far, it even has favour with some pre-Socratic philosophers. Person 4 begins by tracing the beginning of the idea of a spherical earth rotating around the sun to the teachings of Pythagoras, about 2600 years ago, Aristotle's acceptance of the spherical model based on empirical evidence around 2300 years ago, as well as presenting you with the works of Claudius Ptolemy and virtually every influential scholar and scientist of our era, furthermore objective evidence such as the horizon's properties and countless accounts of individuals circumnavigating the earth is also put forth. 
Now you can either accept the overwhelming general consensus along with 2 MILLENNIA of empirical evidence and debate and assume the position that the earth is in fact round. OR you can choose to reject the collective knowledge of the world and assume that all of those great minds have been deliberately spinning lies and making up an intricate and extremely consistent fabrication spanning everything we know about the universe in order to trick the general public for no apparent reason or prospects of gain, all whilst everyone remains oblivious to this devious plot except for YOU, aren't you the special one. However, even if you do reject all the evidence supporting a spherical earth, the evidence you have for a flat earth theory are nowhere near enough to prove your conclusion of a flat earth. 

TL;DR: 
Evidence in support of...

The Spherical Earth: Proposed around 2600 years ago on basis of observation by influential historical figures and since agreed upon by pretty much everyone who mattered. No substantial evidence to refute it. Backed up by countless empirical evidence and agrees with all objective observations. 

The Flat Earth: Proposed in archaic times in myths and legends, usually fantastical or religious. Not based on actual observation but rather assumptions about the physical properties of the world. Claims the earth has an edge, yet no-one has found it yet.

Newton's laws of motion describe the motion of an object in a non-accelerating, inertial frame of reference. When Newton's laws are transformed to a uniformly rotating frame of reference, the Coriolis and centrifugal forces appear. Both forces are proportional to the mass of the object.
Because the Earth completes one rotation per day, the Coriolis force is quite small, and its effects generally become noticeable only for motions occurring over large distances and long periods of time.

Another reason why the earth is round:
Assuming equal sea level, the mass of an object on any point on the earth has the same weight, thus same gravitational force on the object. Many years ago when I lived in San Francisco there was a museum in Golden Gate park that had classic demonstration of the rotation of the Earth. It consisted of a pendulum in the centre of a large circle with wooden pegs at intervals around the circumference. Pendulums swing in a straight line but the Coriolis effect would cause it knock down the pegs, one by one. On gravity, I've personally enjoyed Feynman's thoughts on the subject. The newtonian description of gravity (F = Gmm/r^2) is a law. It has high predictive and explanatory power (i.e. orbits), but all it was was a powerful mathematical description; Newton never tried to explain how gravity came about. By the time of Einstein, we adopted a space-time interpretation of gravity and began to develop notions of what causes gravity. And now, we're quite excited to see a standard model interp.

I won't argue with you on evolution. One can say it shifted labels over the years due to many reasons -- whatever. Ultimately, it's just a label. Is it important to make the distinction? Probably not; useful for giving young people an impression of how confident we are in it, meaningless to those who've been in science long enough to see evolution as the interpretation of innumerable evidence.

The fact that the theory is true?
That's different from the fact that the phenomena occurs. There's two things involved, the phenomena itself and a theory to explain it. Creationists deny that evolution happens at all, they are denying the phenomena.

I never heard of the "law of evolution". There is evolution the phenomena which happens and the theory of evolution (the Neo-Darwinian one, that is Darwin's theory modified to include the many genetic discoveries) which explains how that works. Likewise gravitation is the phenomena, objects with mass (though light has been shown to be affected too) attract each other, and there are theories behind it; it could simply be masses displacing space-time, it could be a force like electromagnetism.
the flat society thinks other wise.... XD

:D

As to whether evolution is theory or fact or law. *ugh* Let's see... When it was first posited, it was definitely a hypothesis. We made predictions based on it and found the hypothesis to be very reliable, so it became a theory. We can quite literally "see" evolution a work in organisms with high doubling rate and poor polymerase fidelity in a matter of hours/days... So.... well, semantics! :P Now the argument becomes philosophical, subjective, and - in all probability - very silly.

Well... we reach a trickier still issue with the term "true." I'm accustomed to the notion of things lying on a confidence scale. If a theory has pass every single experimental test we threw at it, then that' means I'm really happy and have no reason to doubt it (yet). Does that make it true? Perhaps I'm being a bit archaic and classical with my definition of "true" :P
The common definition is akin to "supposition" or "hypothesis" in science its more like "explanation" and theories can still be true yet still be called theories.
That being said, there's no reason why one can't be as confident in a theory as one is in a "fact." It just needs to be a really really good theory.

Sure there is recent genetic engineering and more commonplace, artificial selection and I suppose creation, be it abiogenesis or god isn't really evolution, but nonetheless it is a fact that at least some life as evolved on Earth.

This distinction between theory and "fact" (and even "law") is much tricky -- and even more so for biology than for physics, I daresay. If we define fact as being a directly observable or measurable phenomenon, then a "law" is the realization that a certain observable trend *always* seems to hold true -- even if we can't satisfactorily explain why it's true. The coming up of an testable explanation for a trend (law or otherwise) is a theory :P

Theories (i.e. relativity, evolution) explain phenomena/facts, they can be true and still be called theories.  It's a fact that evolution happens and the theory of evolution explains it and it is still a theory regardless of whether it's true.

Well, for one thing, gravity attracts to an object's center of gravity, not always in one direction. Technically, down is simply the direction to the center of gravity of the object most strongly pulling you with gravity. Considering that the Earth is, for the most part, a near-perfect sphere (whose surface is all points a certain distance (radius) to its center), water would not travel "down" if flowing around a sphere; gravity would always pull perpendicular to a tangent line.

The Earth pulls us towards is, no matter if you're in the 'top' of the sphere or in the 'bottom', and the moon is pulled towards us so it orbits us, and as the Sun is bigger than Earth, we are pulled towards it to orbit it as we do.

The motion of the Sun and Moon is easy to understand when you start to thing about the Earth as a big spheroidal rotating chunk of mass, and due to its current motion, while standing in the same point, the Sun seems to rise every 24 hours as we are orbiting it in an eliptical path, and the Moon, orbiting us, spins around another eliptical orbit in a period of what we call a lunar month. The Flat Earth Society is an organization that seeks to further the archaic belief that the Earth is flat instead of an oblate spheroid. The modern organization was founded by Englishman Samuel Shenton in 1956 and was later led by Charles K. Johnson, who based the organization in his home in Lancaster, California. No one understands what a theory means in scientific terms.  In everyday use, it means something speculative, but when it's applied to science it means that they're pretty much as sure as any human being can possibly be that it is a fact. A theory is something that has been tested over and over and over again until it's proven "true".
